ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary: Shocks and Rockets!!!: Dr. Mindbender calls for Wild Weasel to do an airstrike on the Pit III, but he's foiled by Ace. Spirit survived his 'sacrifice' vs. the B.A.T. from last issue, as Tunnel Rat and Tripwire search outside the Pit III for any unexploded ordnance during the air battle. Snake-Eyes and Storm Shadow confront the Dr. Venom-controlled Billy, and free him from Venom's influence by placing him under the scanner, and trapping Venom's virtual consciousness once again inside via an image of Kwinn taking him captive.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-08 14:58:20. [CVDB268762] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 14:39:54. [Issue ID 823459]
ComicInfo.Characters: Kwinn (image inside brainwave scanner),G.I Joe [Snake-Eyes,Mainframe],Duke,Billy (freed from Dr. Venom's control),Ace,Cobra [Dr. Mindbender,Dr. Venom (images from brainwave scanner)],Storm Shadow,Wild Weasel,B.A.T.S. (damaged),Tripwire;Tunnel Rat,Viper trooper,Spirit Iron-Knife,Stalker
ComicInfo.Title: Shocks and Rockets!!!
